experience.jobDetails: Leveraged data science and advanced analytics to drive increased beer sales at the fastest growing major beer company in the US.• Identified sales trends and market opportunities for leadership teams on key initiatives.• Created and maintained data-driven methodologies for sales processes.• Provided ongoing support for departments on how to leverage data science solutions for business problems.• Implemented new processes and technologies to improve collaboration and efficiency for data science teams.• Created talent pipeline by introducing data science intern program.• Introduced data science and software engineering best practices to create foundation for rapidly-scalable, analytics-driven future.

Acting as lead data scientist and software engineer, project manager, team manager, and spokesman for all Global Tech Sales initiatives at Bud Analytics Lab.• Led team of data scientists, researchers, and software engineers to develop products that measurably and efficiently improve worldwide sales at the word's largest beer company, resulting in over $400M of projected top-line growth.• Interfaced with clients to receive valuable product feedback.• Drove strategy and vision for products by translating research, customer insights, and data discovery into innovative business solutions.• Recruited top-performing interns, FTEs, and contractors.• Collaborated with Global IT, Architecture, Infrastructure, and Sales teams to deploy solutions.Projects• Data consolidation using NLP and machine learning (any language, any data sources)• Prediction of new customer value• Prediction of inventory using time series techniques and survival modeling• Recommender systems using collaborative filtering and matrix factorizations• Trade-marketing investment optimization using machine learning• Webscraping, sentiment analysis, and predictive modeling to drive hyper-local marketing

Software engineer for leading scientific computing and electromagnetics laboratory.• Led independent projects requiring careful attention to detail, planning, collaboration, tracking, and on-time results delivery.• Developed electromagnetics solvers, code auto-generators, and high-performance computing applications utilizing object-orient design, multi-processing, multi-threading, and software-engineering best practices in C++, Fortran, MPI, OpenMP, CUDA, and Python for DoD, DoE, and multiple major government contractors.

Developed, implemented, and tested new methods for solving the phase reconstruction problem in audio processing.  Additionally, investigated and designed new techniques for both general-purpose and power-efficient algebraic multigrid solvers.

Developed and implemented a new parallel, scalable, and uniform random number generator using cryptographic hash functions to achieve improved speed and reliability suitable for large-scale parallel stochastic simulations.
